titles: A proclamation for the incouragement of sea-men and mariners to returne to their obedience to the Kings Majesty, and to contine in his service. / By the King.
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.
notes: Date of publication taken from Wing (2nd ed.)
